verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: claimed] [ARG1: a memo that former FBI Director James Comey gave to a friend “ in order to get a special counsel against me ” was “ all classified … totally classified] . ” That ’s wrong .

President Donald Trump claimed a memo that former FBI Director James Comey gave to a friend “ in order to [V: get] [ARG1: a special counsel against me] ” was “ all classified … totally classified . ” That ’s wrong .
